subject: Here's what's been on my mind lately
preheader: Plus, my picks for free content to help you own the day and sleep through the night

Block1.Block_Body:
If you're anything like me, there's a daily struggle to manage your time or use it wisely. There's the anxiety of messing up, the worry of melting down, and the fear of missing out.

When you're trying to do everything and be there for everyone, that voice of self-doubt usually pops up saying "where do I begin?" How about beginning here and now?

Let's own the day together â€” one breath, one step at a time.

Block2.Block_H2: A gift from me: take 40% off Calm
Block2.Block_Body: A Calm Premium subscription gives you all the tools you need to feel better in your pocket. All for less than the price of a massage.

Block3.Block_Title: Slip into sleep at the end of the day
Block3.Block_Body: Sleep hasn't always come easy for me. At times, it's even felt like work. Luckily I've found a formula to help me unwind and let go. This session brings together two of my favorite practices to help you drift off easily.

Block7.Block_Title: 7 easy ways to improve your mental health right now
Block7.Block_Body: Our stressful lives often mean that the first thing to get cut from our to-do lists is anything related to self-care. Try these easy tips.

Block10.Block_H1: Small repeated actions lead to lifelong change.
Block10.Block_H2: Forget your to-do list. What's on your to-be list?
Block10.Block_H3: "I'm chaotic" → "I am a person experiencing chaotic thoughts"
Block10.Block_H4: Need to stop a stress spiral? Note it, name it, treat it.
